Description_lang: Imbues the Hopebreaker with a burning rage, increasing movement speed by $s4% and causes successful melee swings to inflict $351110s1 Fire damage to their current target and an additional $351110s2 Fire damage to all other players within $351110A2 yards.
AuraDescription_lang: Successful attacks inflict an additional $351110s1 Fire damage and additionally explode for $351110s2 Fire damage to other players within $351110A2 yards.Movement speed increased by $s4%.
